ModMetaData.name: Thrumbo Extension
ModMetaData.author: leafzxg
ModMetaData.description:
Supported Languages: ChineseSimplified ChineseTraditional English Korean Polish Russian
[Mod version: 1.3.0] Function: Add： 1.Thrumbo can produce wool (cycle:60 days,produce 300 once,market value:32;Products' price multiplier:1.5) 2.Thrumbo can produce milk (cycle:15 days,produce 5 once,market value:200) 3.Thrumbo can packed (three times of the original) 4.Thrumbo is more accessible to people. They can nuzzle with people like cat,make people more happy,and more easier to be named. 5.Thrumbo are more easy to tame (wildness:0.9) 6.Thrumbo's body weight is set to 105kg. 7.Changed kibble and hay's "maxNumToIngestAtOnce" to 200 . As a result, the thrumbo can eat full at once , if it ate kibble or hay. 8.Thrumbo is not easy to catch fire , because of its wool's insulation effect is very good.
